title: Illinois: The Land of LincTrend 12/6: Chris Cuomo, 'Matrix', Bob Dole, NYC, DOJ, Alec Baldwin
itunes:title: Illinois: The Land of LincTrend 12/6: Chris Cuomo, 'Matrix', Bob Dole, NYC, DOJ, Alec Baldwin
description:
In this edition of Illinois: The Land of LincTrend, Jack and Miles discuss Chris Cuomo getting fired, the new 'Matrix; Resurrection' trailer, Bob Dole passing away, NYC's vaccine mandate, DOJ suing Texas over redistricting maps, and Alec Baldwin's GMA interview.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
